import React, { useState } from 'react' import "./header.css" const Header = () => { /* Change Backgrorund Header */ window.addEventListener('scroll', function () { const header = document.querySelector('.header') if (this.scrollY >= 560) header.classList.add('scroll-header') else header.classList.remove('scroll-header') }) const [toggle, showMenu] = useState(false) const [activeNav, setActiveNav] = useState('#home') return (
Me

  • setActiveNav('#contact')} className={activeNav === '#contact' ? "nav__link active-link" : "nav__link"} > Contact
